scripts.angular: run(){ if [ -z "$1" ]; then npm run -s prompt; else echo "  $(npm run -s install @angular/cli) && ng new $1;"; fi; };run
scripts.cra: run(){ if [ -z "$1" ]; then npm run -s prompt; else echo "  $(npm run -s install create-react-app) && create-react-app $1;"; fi; };run
scripts.ember: run(){ if [ -z "$1" ]; then npm run -s prompt; else echo "  $(npm run -s install ember-cli) && ember new $1;"; fi; };run
scripts.gatsby: run(){ if [ -z "$1" ]; then npm run -s prompt; else echo "  $(npm run -s install -g gatsby-cli) && gatsby new $1;"; fi; };run
scripts.preact: run(){ if [ -z "$1" ]; then npm run -s prompt; else echo "  $(npm run -s install preact-cli) && preact create default $1;"; fi; };run
scripts.vue: run(){ if [ -z "$1" ]; then npm run -s prompt; else echo "  $(npm run -s install @vue/cli) && vue create $1; "; fi; }; run
scripts.rn: run(){ echo 'react-native-app'; if [ -z "$1" ]; then npm run -s prompt; else echo "  $(npm run -s install expo-cli) && expo init $1;"; fi; };run
scripts.js-house: run(){ if [ -z "$1" ]; then npm run -s prompt; else echo 'runAll(){'; npm run -s angular angular-$1; npm run -s cra cra-$1; npm run -s ember ember-$1; npm run -s gatsby gatsby-$1; npm run -s preact preact-$1; npm run -s vue vue-$1; echo '}; runAll'; echo ; fi; }; run
scripts.js-house-select: run(){ if [ -z "$1" ]; then npm run -s prompt; else npm run -s angular $1; npm run -s cra $1; npm run -s ember $1; npm run -s gatsby $1;  npm run -s preact $1; npm run -s vue $1; fi; }; run
scripts.install: run(){ echo "npm uninstall -g $1 && npm install -g $1"; }; run
scripts.prompt: echo 'no arg passed ðŸ™‚,'; echo 'exiting: please provide a file name';
scripts.show: dir(){ for d in ./*/ ; do (echo "$d"); done; }; echo 'project update: look at all of the cool projects! âœ¨ âœ¨ ðŸŒˆ '; echo ; dir; echo ;
